title: STAT+: NIH specifies how grant reviewers should ensure alignment with Trump priorities
description: In a memo obtained by STAT, the NIH gives specific steps on how grant reviewers can check for alignment with administration priorities.
content: In a memo obtained by STAT, the NIH gives specific steps on how grant reviewers can check for alignment with administration priorities.
